name: No Name Survivor
description:
No Name Survivor is a casual Survival Game that aims to bring new players to the genre, by having the basic needs and a great focus on surviving not against players, enemies or luck, but only against your physical needs.

As a game without enemies, I will be adding plenty ways to build your own world and explore your creativity with resources gathered.

This game is still in development and for now, this is the only platform available for you to download it. Any comments, feedbacks, bugs and new ideas are totally welcome!

The donation option is available, so if you want to help me developing this project, I will be grateful.
